login.title: Login methods
login.sub-header-1: There are different ways of logging in with your DigiD. The more login methods you add, the more you can arrange online.
login.sub-header-2: The last time you logged in to DigiD was on
login.digid-app-sub: These are your DigiD apps. Click on 'More details' for more information or to deactivate the app.
login.delete-subtitle: You can delete your DigiD. In that case, you cannot log in with DigiD anywhere, unless you request a new DigiD.
login.logged-in: You are logged in to My DigiD
